Reference

All functions

change_case_info()

Rename a Sobek Case

change_output_ntstep()

This function change the output time steps

change_rl_rs()

Change reference level of a cross section

change_tble()

change table value of one id in the DAT file

check_fra()

Checking Frankfurt data transferring from Main to Rhein Model. Both lines should be the same

check_worms()

Checking Worms Input

create_case()

Create new Sobek Case from existing Case

create_dat()

Create Sobek Input .DAT from

.his_from_locs()

Get data of given locations and parameter

.his_parameter()

Get parameter table from .HIS & .HIA files

.id2loc()

Convert Sobek ID to location index

exl_std

Standard colors in Excel

get_column_by_name()

Return data for one column in a data table with value stored in the column parameter

get_control_info()

Get information of a controller

get_data_from_id()

Get the Data table for an element with specific ID from a .DAT files

get_delta_table()

Get max value table

get_drv_data()

Get data table for a DRV

get_file_path()

Get file path from sobek case name

get_id_tbl()

Get id tables for one measure from the master.tbl

get_polder_data()

Get related time series for a measure

get_polder_max()

Calculate maximum values for a measure and its referenced location

get_polder_volume()

Get total volume for one measure

get_segment_data()

Get data table for a river segment

get_segment_id_tbl()

Get id tables for one segment of a river

get_struct_ct()

Get controlling information of a structure

get_struct_info()

Get information of a structure

get_summary_tbl()

Get max value table

his_2_csv()

Convert his file to CSV, for one parameter

his_from_case()

Export data for nodes/reaches for multiple SOBEK Cases

his_from_file()

Export data for nodes/reaches using IDs from a file

his_from_list()

Export data for nodes/reaches using IDs from a list

his_info()

Read basic information of the .HIS file

his_location()

Read location table from .HIS file Locations are SOBEK's internal index of the node/reach IDs sobek.ids are IDs of nodes/reaches in the River Network sobek.id are automatically truncated to max. length of 20 characters by SOBEK

parse_case()

Parse case name to get standard information

plot_drv()

Plot long profile for a DRV

plot_longprofile()

Plot long profile for a river segment

plot_multi_lines()

Plot hydrographs at different locations

plot_polder()

Plot hydrographs for a measure with comparing by scenario (zustand)

plot_polder_scenario()

Plot hydrographs for a measure with comparing by scenario (zustand)

plot_shiny()

Plot hydrographs for a measure with comparing by scenario (zustand)

polder_tmv()

Search for a polder TMV

set_q_const()

Set Value of an element in .DAT file to constant, and remove the time serie table

set_weir_pfd()

Set possible flow direction. Use it to close or open a simple weir

sobek_case_info()

Read .HIS information for a case

sobek_export()

Export list of cases from a sobek project to another location

sobek_sim()

Run Sobek Simulation for single case

sobek_view()

Run Sobek Simulation for single case

sobek_view_result()

Run Sobek Simulation for single case

switch_DRV()

Change profile definitions for DRV

transfer_fra()

Change Rhein Modell Boundary 'Frankfurt Ost (66) by ts from Main Output This function is to extract Main Model output at Frankfurt Osthafen and paste it as input to Rhein Model (boundary node '66')

volume_center()

Find the center of (mass) volume and peaks

w_q_pegel()

Plot the W~Q curve at a measurement station (pegel)

Contents

  • All functions
